mapper.select: select mp.*, (SELECT count(*) FROM evaluation E JOIN MOVIE M ON e.movie_no=m.movie_no where user_id=#{id} and movie_director = mp.movie_people_name ) as count from movie_people mp where movie_people_name in (select movie_director from (select g.*,rownum r from (SELECT count(movie_director) c,movie_director FROM evaluation E JOIN MOVIE M ON e.movie_no=m.movie_no where user_id=#{id} group by movie_director order by c desc)g ) a )
